TEXT.TITLE: PREMDOR PLANS TWO-FOR-ONE STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: <Premdor Inc> said it planned a two-for-one common stock split, subject to shareholder approval at the May 4 annual meeting. It said the split, if approved, would take effect on May 20. Premdor manufactures and sells wood doors. Reuter
